name: MANHUNT (itch)
description:
MANHUNT

A multiplayer TTRPG, full of fighting and possibility. 
Estimated for 3-4 hour play, with ability to adapt and extend gameplay into a mini campaign.
This game is far from polished, but was very fun to make and I hope it's fun. Let me know what you think, or how to improve!

The Students are trying not to die. The Professionals are trying to kill them. The house sits in between, facilitating the addictive thirst for fun. What do you want to happen?

What you'll need: One or more d4 dice, paper, pen, Players, A House Master, A coin, and a character.

Everything else is (hopefully) in the PDF. Have fun!

Content warning: Blood, violence, body parts, and other battle royal characteristics (but with monsters)
